body.p:
Louisville 7 April 1865
Hon. Thos E. Bramlett,
Govenor of Ky;
Dear Sir

Inclosed please find a petition of Jos Hiram and his acquaintances for remission of a small fine. I know myself it is a meritorious application. He is very poor and has nothing but a wife and small squalid children. I failed to send it for some time in hopes he might be able to make some arrangement, but the matter presses him again, and he is compelled to seek Executive Clemency

City Ct of Louisville
vs
Joseph Hemming
$100 --
Remitted
27th Apl/65
